about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Walpar Nutritions manufactures different types of Nutraceutical, Ayurvedic, Cosmeceuticals, Sexual Wellness, and food supplement products. It has developed 100+ formulations and 1000 brands under different segments i.e. Orthopaedics, Cardiac, Diabetic, Dermatology, Pain Management, Antibiotics, Gynaecology, Neuro, Gastro-Intestinal, and sports nutrition. It further manufactures tablets, capsules, Ointments, creams, lotions, gels and sachet, powders, liquid orals, etc.

The company has a manufacturing facility in Gandhinagar with an installed manufacturing capacity of 23 lakhs tablet/month, 12.50 lakhs capsules/month, 1.50 lakhs oral liquids/month, and 2 lakhs sachets/month.

Competitive strengths

  • Large product portfolio with 70+ products.
  • Strong product manufacturing and development capabilities.
  • Best quality products, certified by FSSAI and AYUSH department.

faqs.question: What is the Walpar Nutritions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Walpar Nutritions IPO is a SME IPO of 1200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 30, 2021, and closes on July 5, 2021.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Walpar Nutritions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Walpar Nutritions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Walpar Nutritions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Walpar Nutritions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Walpar Nutritions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Walpar Nutritions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Walpar Nutritions IPO opens on June 30, 2021 and closes on July 5, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Walpar Nutritions IPO?
faqs.answer: Walpar Nutritions IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Walpar Nutritions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Walpar Nutritions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Walpar Nutritions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Walpar Nutritions IPO will be done on Thursday, July 8, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, July 9, 2021. Check the Walpar Nutritions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Walpar Nutritions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Walpar Nutritions IPO listing date is on Tuesday, July 13, 2021.
